attributes.action: Grant Fathers equal rights to Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a marriage or relationship breaks down and children are involved. The side of the Mother is always taken and yet the Father does not get the same treatment we are therefore petitioning that Fathers be given equal rights over a child

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
